testcase.classname: Acceptance Testing to validate the New Search Car page is working fine.
testcase.name: Validate the New Serach Car Page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on homepage "https://www.carsguide.com.au/" of carsguide portal..passed When I move to the menu.....................................................passed And Click on "New Search Cars" link on New Search Cars......................passed And Select carbrand as "Alfa Romeo" from AnyMake dropdown on New Search Cars.passed And Select car model on New Search Car page.................................passed And Select location as "NSW - All" from locations dropdown on New Search Cars.passed And Select price as "$3,000" from prices dropdown on New Search Cars........passed And Click on Find my next car button on New Search Cars.....................passed Then I should see the searched cars list on New Search Cars.................passed And The page title should be "Bmw 118d Under 45000 for Sale Hunter NSW | carsguide".passed
